alert.note: Alert for Tillamook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 3:41PM PST until March 01 at 2:31AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon...Washington... Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. Grays River near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Wilson River near Tillamook. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...Above 12.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low lying dairy and pasture land north and east of Tillamook, particularly during high tides. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM PST Monday the stage was 12.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:30 PM PST Monday was 12.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest near 13.0 feet this afternoon and fall below flood stage tonight. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1015 PM PST.
